statements: SELECT * FROM guerrilla_marketing_media;
SELECT media_type, event_date, image_url FROM guerrilla_marketing_media ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT media_type, description FROM guerrilla_marketing_media WHERE media_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM guerrilla_marketing_media WHERE event_id = 10;
SELECT media_type, description, event_date FROM guerrilla_marketing_media ORDER BY event_date ASC, media_type;
SELECT media_id, media_type, event_id, event_date, image_url, video_url, description FROM guerrilla_marketing_media WHERE media_type='Social Media' ORDER BY event_date DESC, media_id ASC
SELECT media_id, media_type, event_id, event_date, image_url, video_url, description FROM guerrilla_marketing_media WHERE event_id=1001 ORDER BY media_id DESC, event_date ASC
SELECT event_id, COUNT(media_id) AS total_media FROM guerrilla_marketing_media GROUP BY event_id HAVING total_media > 5 ORDER BY total_media DESC
SELECT media_type, COUNT(*) AS total_media FROM guerrilla_marketing_media GROUP BY media_type ORDER BY total_media DESC
SELECT DISTINCT media_type FROM guerrilla_marketing_media ORDER BY media_type ASC
SELECT * FROM images WHERE event_id = 1;
SELECT image_url, image_description FROM images WHERE event_id = 2;
SELECT image_id, image_url, image_description FROM images WHERE event_id = 3 ORDER BY image_id DESC;
SELECT image_id, image_url, image_description FROM images WHERE event_id = 4 ORDER BY image_description ASC;
SELECT video_id, video_url, duration FROM videos WHERE event_id = 5 ORDER BY duration DESC;
SELECT * FROM images WHERE event_id = 1;
SELECT image_url, image_description FROM images WHERE image_id = 100;
SELECT video_url, video_description, duration FROM videos WHERE event_id = 2;
SELECT image_url, image_description FROM images WHERE event_id = 3 ORDER BY image_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM videos WHERE duration > 60;
SELECT * FROM guerrilla_marketing_images;
SELECT event_id, image_url FROM guerrilla_marketing_images WHERE event_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc';
SELECT DISTINCT event_id, location FROM guerrilla_marketing_events ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT event_id, image_url, timestamp FROM guerrilla_marketing_images WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_name, event_date, description FROM guerrilla_marketing_events WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT image_url, description, timestamp FROM guerrilla_marketing_images WHERE event_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM guerrilla_marketing_videos WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_name, event_date, location FROM guerrilla_marketing_events WHERE event_date > '2021-06-30';
SELECT image_id, image_url FROM guerrilla_marketing_images ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT event_name, description FROM guerrilla_marketing_events WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM guerrilla_marketing_events WHERE event_type = 'image';
SELECT event_date, event_location FROM guerrilla_marketing_events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_description FROM guerrilla_marketing_events WHERE event_location LIKE '%City%';
SELECT event_id, event_location FROM guerrilla_marketing_events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_id, event_type, COUNT(*) AS total_events FROM guerrilla_marketing_events GROUP BY event_type;
SELECT * FROM guerrilla_marketing_events WHERE event_type = 'image';
SELECT event_id, event_date, event_location FROM guerrilla_marketing_events WHERE event_type = 'video' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_id, event_description FROM guerrilla_marketing_events WHERE event_location LIKE '%New York%';
SELECT e.event_id, i.image_url, i.image_description FROM guerrilla_marketing_events e JOIN event_images i ON e.event_id = i.event_id WHERE i.image_description IS NOT NULL;

SELECT o.organizer_name, o.organizer_email, COUNT(e.event_id) AS event_count FROM event_organizers o JOIN guerrilla_marketing_events e ON o.organizer_id = e.event_id GROUP BY o.organizer_name ORDER BY event_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM images;
SELECT image_url, event_date FROM images WHERE event_id = 100;
SELECT event_name, location FROM events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT participant_name, role FROM event_participants WHERE event_id = 200 ORDER BY participant_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM images WHERE event_id = 1;
SELECT image_url, event_date FROM images WHERE image_id = 10;
SELECT event_name, location FROM events WHERE event_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE end_date > '2022-05-31';
SELECT participant_name, role FROM event_participants WHERE event_id = 5 AND role = 'Speaker';
